values.value:
The eForm is in draft mode and can be accessed and edited by clicking “Access eForm” at the top right.
All listed research personnel and administrators can edit the eForm, but the Principal Investigator must make the final declaration and submission.
At this stage, you can still edit the “Research Personnel” and “Ethics Application Title” fields.
To Update Research Personnel
• Remove someone: Go to the Research Personnel tab, click the dropdown arrow > Edit, enter an End Date, and Save.
• Change role: Same steps, but update the Role only (no End Date).
• Add personnel: Click “Add Research Personnel” (top right).
Tip: Use LTU email for accurate results.
Remember to click “Save Draft” before exiting the eForm. You can return and continue editing at any time.
